description: This file defines a React-style component using Qwik, implementing a note editor interface with functionalities to create, edit, delete, and validate notes. It manages internal state for the note data, handling user input and integrating with a backend API.

methods.name: NoteEditor
methods.description: A Qwik component that provides a user interface for editing notes, including title, body, tags, and actions to save, delete, or cancel.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Function to save or update a note by sending a fetch request to the backend API, with validation for the title.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Function to delete a note via API call, invoked when the delete button is clicked.
